short_summary: Contract for Chemical Analysis of 1st Nations Drinking Water Supplies
full_summary:
# First Nation Chemical Sampling Program(Request for Proposal)

## Notice Information

* **Reference Number:** CB-6019-89547745
* **Publication Date:** June 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 16, 2023 14:00:00

## Tender Description

Indigenous Services Canada, First Nations and Inuit Health Branch (FNIHB), Ontario Region invites licensed and accredited laboratories to participate in a Request for Proposal for the chemical analysis of drinking water supplies for First Nations in Southern, Thunder Bay West, Thunder Bay East, and Sioux Lookout regions.

The successful contractor will be awarded a contract for services in these four distinct areas. The initial contract period will run from the date of contract award to March 31, 2024, with the option to extend by up to four one-year periods.

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Service
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria:** Combined rating for technical merit and price

## Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to Ontario (excluding National Capital Region).

## Regions of Delivery

The contract will be delivered in Ontario (excluding National Capital Region).

## Attachments

Tender documents are available for download on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6019/rfp---chemical---1000248912---en_0.pdf) (English) and [Canada Buys website (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6019/rfp---chemical--1000248912---fr_0.pdf)
